name: The Art of Shattering
description:
The Art of Shattering is a game made by Pink Fluffy Unicorns where you play as Cody, an artist who is struggling to find the true meaning of art. In his struggles and frustrations, he goes all Hero Killer Stain and decides to purge the modern art museum of all pieces he deems "unworthy". Which is everything. So just smash shit. 

And through your trials and tribulations, maybe one day, the true meaning of art... will finally reveal itself. But that, ladies and gentlemen, is what art has been all about from the beginning.

Not sponsored by Pepsi.
